mapper.insert: insert into reservation(rv_date, rv_room_num, rv_start_date, rv_end_date, rv_status, rv_total_price, rv_stay_person, mb_id) values(#{rv_date}, #{rv_room_num}, #{rv_start_date}, #{rv_end_date}, '상태', #{rv_total_price}, #{rv_stay_person}, #{mb_id})
mapper.update: update reservation set rv_start_date = #{rv_start_date}, rv_end_date = #{rv_end_date}, rv_room_num = #{rv_room_num}, mb_id = #{mb_id}, rv_date = #{rv_date}, rv_stay_person = #{rv_stay_person}, rv_total_price = #{rv_total_price} where rv_id = #{rv_id}
